backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three feature IDs (IconHisto SVG replacement, IconLabs SVG replacement, CalendarCaseCard navigation) to their affected files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated documentation file containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw React SPA with PWA meta tags, manifest link, favicon, and a root div mounting point for the Vite/React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, theme colors, display mode, and icon assets at 192×192 and 512×512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of the app shell on install, old cache cleanup on activate, and runtime caching of static assets while bypassing Internet Identity and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and a sticky header with login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG icon component depicting a petri dish with bacterial colonies, using the `culture` workflow color token and supporting an `isCompleted` overlay via WorkflowIconBase.

SVG icon component depicting a calendar/daily-summary page with ruled lines and binding holes, using the `dailySummary` workflow color token and supporting an `isCompleted` overlay via WorkflowIconBase.
Renders a discharge notes workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a file/document SVG path and green color token.
Renders a follow-up workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a circular arrow SVG representing a follow-up action.
Renders a histology workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a side-view microscope SVG composed of multiple shapes.
Renders an imaging workflow icon using a grayscale X-ray bone PNG image, overlaying an X mark SVG when the task is completed.
Renders a labs workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a test tube SVG including a liquid fill line and bubble dots.
Renders a PDVM-notified workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a speech bubble SVG in yellow.
Renders a surgery report workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a scalpel SVG drawn at an angle.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that maps a workflowType string to the corresponding specific workflow icon component.
Base wrapper for workflow icons that renders an SVG with the given color and optionally overlays an X mark when isCompleted is true.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Defines shared design tokens for workflow icons including color values per workflow type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for all workflow task types and provides helper functions to filter selected, remaining, and completed checklist items from a Task object.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Compact card component for calendar views that displays a surgery case's pet info, complaint, and clickable workflow icons that toggle task completion.
Expandable card component displaying full surgery case details with workflow task icons, inline checklist editing, edit dialog, and delete functionality.
A dialog component for editing an existing surgery case, pre-populating form fields from the provided case data and submitting updates via the useUpdateCase mutation.
A dialog component for creating a new surgery case with fields for patient info, species, sex, dates, and task checklist selections, submitted via the useCreateCase mutation.
The main list view for surgery cases, handling fetching, filtering by species/tasks/search, sorting, and rendering case cards along with controls for creating cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by pending task types and a completed-tasks toggle, persisting state to sessionStorage.
Renders the selected checklist tasks for a surgery case as clickable icon buttons that toggle task completion state.
React component providing CSV import and export functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, progress tracking, and creating/updating cases via API mutations with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A controlled date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY text entry with auto-formatting, validation, and a calendar popover picker.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions to serialize surgery cases to CSV and parse/validate CSV files back into structured case data with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 18-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants for species, sex, booleans, and date format.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports pure functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: Custom React hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Exports preprocessOcrText, which normalizes whitespace, corrects common OCR character errors, and removes artifacts from raw OCR text output.
Parses structured 'Label: Value' text line-by-line and maps recognized labels to CaseFormData fields, handling species, sex, dates, and string fields with voice input variations.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with incomplete tasks using a hidden iframe and the browser's native print dialog, with color-coded task badges.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including remaining checklist tasks, with proper field escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV reports, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a query string, matching against case fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines the CaseFormData interface and constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns used in case forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields, date parsing (MM/DD/YYYY, ISO), date-to-nanoseconds conversion, and Species/Sex enum parsing utilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases in either a weekly calendar or list view, with filtering, sorting, search, and a new case creation dialog.
Weekly calendar React component that renders a 7-column grid of surgery cases grouped by arrival date, with week navigation controls.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/ca: Utility functions for the calendar view, including computing week day arrays, filtering cases by day, formatting week ranges, and checking if a week is the current one.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract and count remaining open checklist tasks across surgery cases, returning structured task item objects.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty settings view component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced result.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state via the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend data operations including fetching/mutating cases, user profiles, dashboard data, and tasks against the ICP canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-only theme, including colors for backgrounds, typography, charts, and domain-specific tokens (patient name, species, complaint, notes).
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped in `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended to provide type augmentations for the jspdf-autotable plugin.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended to provide type augmentations for the jsPDF library.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for `tesseract.js`, defining interfaces for workers, recognition results, logging, and enums for PSM and OEM modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers the `tailwindcss-animate` and `@tailwindcss/typography` plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw tracking existing implemented features (icon replacements, calendar card navigation) and pending feature requests (daily summary task, calendar UI improvements, card linking).
